page.title: 06Kidderminster, Fishing
page.content: It's 7.00 a.m. on a Saturday. I'm going fishing at Wilden Pool. I have white maggots, luncheon meat, bread and hemp seeds for bait. I'm using a carbon fibre rod, swimfeeders and a fibreglass float. In my swimfeeder there is bread and maggots and on my hook there is a maggot. I have a piece of luncheon meat on the hook on my float. I have waited 30 minutes for a bite and I have at long last made my first strike. I land a Crucian Carp wieghing about three pounds. In the three hours I am fishing I catch 24 fish. There are 19 Crucian Carp, 1 Mirror Carp, 3 roach and a Gudgeon.
